ns2:workflow.description: Runs scripts on ESXi hosts listed in the local Configuration

param.name: successfulHosts
param.description: A list of hosts (and output) for which execution was successful

param.name: failedHosts
param.description: A list of hosts (and errors) for commands which failed

attrib.name: hosts
attrib.description: A list of Hosts (either FQDN or IP Address) separated by commas (,)

attrib.name: script
attrib.description: The commands to run on every host. Be sure to separate commands with a semicolon (;)

attrib.name: rebootHosts
attrib.description: whether to reboot hosts after issuing your commands. this will simply run a "shutdown -r 1" on every host if set to true.

attrib.name: continueOnError
attrib.description: Whether to continue if an error is encountered

workflow-item.name: item1
workflow-item.description: Simple task with custom script capability.
